column2: "Ber bi a nna Jesus gyina Genesaret nsutaae ho
column3: na nyimpadɔm akyer no do dɛ woribetsie Nyankopɔn n'asɛm no;"

column2: "ohun ahɛn ebien dɛ wogyinagyina nsutaae no do: na afarfo no efi mu rokɔhor hɔn mboa."
"Na ɔkɔr hɛn no kor a ɔyɛ Simon dze no no mu
column3: na ɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔnkwan mfi daadze kakra. Na ɔtsenaa ase na ofi hɛn no mu kyerɛkyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no."

column2: "Na ogyaa kasa no
column3: ɔsee Simon dɛ
column5: na hom nkɔtow hom mboa mfa nam."

column2: "Na Simon buae see dɛ
column3: Yewura
column5: a yeennya hwee; naaso w'asɛm ntsi mobɔtow eboa no."

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm no
column3: wɔpaa nam pii

column2: "Na wɔtoo nsa frɛɛ afarfo bi a wɔwɔ hɛn kor no mu dɛ wɔmbra mbɔboa hɔn. Na wɔbae bɛhyɛɛ ahɛn ebien nyina amaama
column3: ma nkyɛ wɔreyɛ esiw mpo."

column2: "Na Simon Peter hunii no
column3: ɔhwee Jesus n'ananadze see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ɔno nye hɔn a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ nyina ahobow
column3: wɔ nam dodow a wɔfae no ntsi;"

column2: "na dɛm ara so na ɔyɛɛ James nye John
column3: Zebedee mba no a wɔnye Simon yɛ apofo no. Na Jesus see Simon dɛ
column4: Mma nnsuro: na ofitsi ndɛ ibonu nyimpa."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn ahɛn bodwiir daadze no
column3: wɔdaan ne nyina gyae

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔwɔ nkurow no mu kor mu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔbarimba bi a kwata ayɛ no ho ma baa hɔ; na ohun Jesus no
column9: ibotum dɛ ema mo ho san."

column2: "Na ɔtseen ne nsa dze kaa no see dɛ
column3: Mepɛ
column4: wo ho nsan.  Na ntsɛmara na kwata no fii no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbraa no dɛ:  mma nnka nnkyerɛ obiara; kɔ
column3: fa woho kɛkyerɛ ɔsɔfo no
column4: na w'ahosan ntsi kotua dza Moses hyɛe no fa yɛ dase ma hɔn."

column2: "Na afei dze ne nka tahyee mbordo
column3: na nyimpadodow pii behyiaa dɛ woribetsie no

column2: "Na ɔtwee noho kɔr sar no do kɔsɔree."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ da bi ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no
column3: nna Farisiifo nye mbra no n'akyerɛkyerɛfo a wofi Galilii
column4: Judea nye Jerusalɛm nkurow nyina mu aba tsetse hɔ; na Ewuradze n'ahoɔdzen wɔ no do dɛ ɔdze bɛsa yarba."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: mbanyin bi dze nyimpa bi a ɔyar mbubui da mpa do bae
column4: na wɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ wobenya kwan dze no abɔto n'enyim."

column2: "Na woennya kwan a wɔdze no bodua mu aba wɔ nyimpadodow no ntsi no
column3: wɔkɔr dan no etsifi
column4: na wɔdze no duaa dan no nkurii no mu wɔ ne mpa do besii finimfin wɔ Jesus n'enyim."

column2: "Na ohun hɔn gyedzi no
column3: ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na akyerɛwfo nye Farisiifo no hyɛɛ ase dwendween dɛ
column3: Na woana nye yi a ɔreka ebususɛm yi? Woana botum dze bɔn akyɛ gyedɛ Nyankopɔn nko?"

column2: "Na Jesus hun hɔn adwendwen no
column3: obuae see hɔn dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na hom rodwendwen wɔ hom akoma mu yi?"

column2: "Dza ɔwɔ hen na ɔyɛ mberɛw kɛse
column3: dɛ ebɛse dɛ
column4: Wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo; anaa ebɛse dɛ

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma hom ehu dɛ nyimpa Ba no wɔ tum wɔ asaase do dɛ ɔdze bɔn kyɛ no ntsi
column3: (ɔkaa kyerɛɛ nyia ɔyar mbubui no dɛ
column6: fa wo mpa na kɔ wo fie."

column2: "Na
column3: ntsɛmara ɔsoɛree wɔ hɔn enyim na ɔfaa dza ɔda do no
column4: na osii mu kɔr ne fie

column2: "Na ahobow kaa hɔn nyina
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam; na hu kɛse kaa hɔn ma wɔkaa dɛ

column2: "Na iyi ekyir no
column3: opuei na okohun towgyenyi bi a ne dzin dze Levi

column2: "Na ɔdaan biribiara gyae
column3: na ɔsoɛree kaa no do."

column2: "Na Levi too no pon kɛsenara wɔ ne fie; na atowgyefo nye nkorɔfo bi
column3: nyimpadodow kɛsenara

column2: "Na Farisiifo nye hɔn akyerɛwfo no hwinhwinii kyerɛɛ n'esuafo no see dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom nye atowgyefo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo dzidzi nom yi?"

column2: "Na Jesus buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hɔn a wɔtse hɔn apɔw mu no
column5: na mbom hɔn a wɔyar no a."

column2: "Mammbɛfrɛ atseneneefo
column3: na mbom ndzebɔnyɛfo

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: John n'esuafo no dze
column6: na Farisiifo so dɛmara; naaso wodze yi dze

column2: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Aso hom botum ama ayefor asefo no edzi mbuada aber a ayeforkun no wɔ hɔn nkyɛn no?"

column2: "Na nda no bɛba
column3: na sɛ woyi ayeforkun no fi hɔn nkyɛn a
column4: ɔno na nda no mu wobedzi mbuada."

column2: "Na obuu bɛ yi so kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Obi nntsew tam fofor sin nntaa atar dadaw mu: dɛm no
column5: osiandɛ sin fofor a ɔdze taa mu no nye dadaw no nnkɛsaa."

column2: "Na obi mmfa wenyin fofor nngu nwomatoa dadaw mu: dɛm no
column3: wenyin fofor no bɛpaa nwomatoa no

column2: "Na wenyin fofor dze
column3: ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze gu ntoa fofor mu."

column2: "Na obiara nnom wenyin dadaw nwie na ɔnnhwehwɛ fofor. Dza ɔka nye dɛ
column3: Dadaw no ara ye."
